heading: HB00655
0: AN ACT CONVERTING THE NORTHWESTERN MINDANAO STATE COLLEGE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (NMSCST) IN THE CITY OF TANGUB, PROVINCE OF MISAMIS OCCIDENTAL INTO A STATE UNIVERSITY TO BE KNOWN AS THE UNIVERSITY OF NORTHWESTERN MINDANAO (UNM), INTEGRATING THEREWITH THE SATELLITE CAMPUSES OF MINDANAO UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (MUST) IN THE CITY OF OROQUIETA AND IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF PANAON, THE SATELLITE CAMPUSES OF THE MINDANAO STATE UNIVERSITY-ILIGAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (MSU-IIT) IN THE MUNICIPALITIES OF BALIANGAO AND LOPEZ JAENA, AND THE OZAMIZ CITY SCHOOL OF ARTS AND TRADE (OCSAT), IN THE CITY OF OZAMIZ, ALL IN THE PROVINCE OF MISAMIS OCCIDENTAL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA11186 enacted on 2019-01-10 Substituted by HB06465
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00655
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CONVERTING THE NORTHWESTERN MINDANAO STATE COLLEGE OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (NMSCST) IN THE CITY OF TANGUB, PROVINCE OF MISAMIS OCCIDENTAL INTO A STATE UNIVERSITY TO BE KNOWN AS THE UNIVERSITY OF NORTHWESTERN MINDANAO (UNM), INTEGRATING THEREWITH THE SATELLITE CAMPUSES OF MINDANAO UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY (MUST) IN THE CITY OF OROQUIETA AND IN THE MUNICIPALITY OF PANAON, THE SATELLITE CAMPUSES OF THE MINDANAO STATE UNIVERSITY-ILIGAN INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (MSU-IIT) IN THE MUNICIPALITIES OF BALIANGAO AND LOPEZ JAENA, AND THE OZAMIZ CITY SCHOOL OF ARTS AND TRADE (OCSAT), IN THE CITY OF OZAMIZ, ALL IN THE PROVINCE OF MISAMIS OCCIDENTAL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : OAMINAL, HENRY S.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: LOCAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Approved by the Committee on 2017-03-13
      2. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-03-16
          -referred to committee on appro for funding comments
      3. Transmmitted to the Committee on Ways and Means on 2017-03-16
          -referred to committee on ways and means for comment on tax provision
      4. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-02
          -Approved pursuant to Section 44 of the Rules of the House of Representatives, 17th Congress, without amendment.
      5. Recommendations transmitted to the committee of referral on 2017-05-02
          -comment from committee on appro received
      6. Recommendations transmitted to the committee of referral on 2017-05-20
          -received comment from committee on ways and means on tax provisions
      7. Committee Report filed on 2017-09-26
          -substituted by HB 6465
MOTHER BILL: HB06465
